name: The Lost Wizard
description: Enter the magical castle of The Lost Wizard,you are tibiothar a skilled wizard, the castle was attacked by the evil skeleton king, free the magician Althazar from the tyranny of skeleton king and bring peace inside the castle of Althazar, destroy the army of darkness. Your actions will be remembered forever.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Cpu dual core 2,5 Ghz or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: intel Hd 4000 \ ati series 7000 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Common sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Cpu dual core 2,5 Ghz or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia geforce 650 \ ati series 7770 or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Common sound card
